field.name: types
field.description: A set of asset types (node must match at least one) to include in the search results, such as image-asset or video-asset.

field.name: linked_ref
field.description: A node ref that an asset must be linked with to match the search request.

field.name: gallery_ref
field.description: A node ref to a gallery that an asset must be in to match the search request.

field.name: gallery_seq_min
field.description: Each asset in a gallery has a sequence number. This number is the lowest sequence number to find when searching for assets in a gallery.

field.name: gallery_seq_max
field.description: Each asset in a gallery has a sequence number. This number is the highest sequence number to find when searching for assets in a gallery.
